com.quantcomponents.core.remote
Interface ITaskMonitorHostLocal

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskMonitorHost
public interface ITaskMonitorHostLocal

Local interface for ITaskMonitorHost This interface is used on the client side in a distributed configuration, to make the UI task monitors visible to the server.

Method Summary
 ServiceHandle<ITaskMonitorHost> addTaskMonitor(ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
          Add a real task monitor to the host, and receive a handle to it in exchange.
 void deleteTaskMonitor(ServiceHandle<ITaskMonitorHost> taskMonitorHandle)
          Deletes a task monitor corresponding to the handle.
 

Method Detail

addTaskMonitor

ServiceHandle<ITaskMonitorHost> addTaskMonitor(ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
Add a real task monitor to the host, and receive a handle to it in exchange. The handle will then be used by the server side to communicate to this object, which in turn will operate the original task monitor.

Parameters:
taskMonitor - a task monitor from the UI
Returns:
a handle for this task monitor, to be used in the communications with the server

deleteTaskMonitor

void deleteTaskMonitor(ServiceHandle<ITaskMonitorHost> taskMonitorHandle)
Deletes a task monitor corresponding to the handle. This method is important to detach listeners and free remote resources.

Parameters:
taskMonitorHandle - the handle of the task monitor to delete
